author: Unspoken❤️
text:
Setting intentions for accountability:

Yesterday was tearful.

Today began at sunrise w/ homemade hazelnut mocha. I’m on a challenging work duty, so calm background music. Ideally, I’ll finish up early enough to indulge in a bit of outdoor alone time. 

Today will be peaceful.

author: Unspoken❤️
text: Goals https://t.co/NKeMJ9QItG

author: Unspoken❤️
text: Someday, to meet someone, who would want me to be that person. https://t.co/eLbIhikB9z

author: Unspoken❤️
text:
At least this I can still give. 

The one I divorced lacked empathy & could not connect, the following have been necessary therapeutic friends. The best of me is still safely tucked away. Only one will truly know all of me. https://t.co/nrfw2XdjE6

author: Unspoken❤️
text:
Changes and motion
Silent and solitary
Seasick standing still

author: Unspoken❤️
text: All forms of self-delusion fundamentally make something easier now in exchange for more difficulty later.

author: Unspoken❤️
text: Choices? They were never mine to make. I had to work with the remnants & repercussions of your decisions, so I did. My choices would have been different. Again, just ask.

author: Unspoken❤️
text: Stalking me & trying to dissect me? Waste of time. You know I’m an open book & an overthinker. I don’t play those games whose rules you keep trying to use to dissect me. Just ask.

author: Unspoken❤️
text:
Quiet moment
Forced of circumstance
A calm before

Shifting unknown
Arrival of waves
Unexplained
Yet undeniable

Eversion
Exposure raw
Armor tucked away
Sensation
Overtakes

Adrift
In a longing
Without direction
And uncertain

How to manage
Involuntary baring
Of sequestered heart

author: Unspoken❤️
text: If it becomes cyclic, seek the lesson… Often we hide it from ourselves

author: Unspoken❤️
text:
Study mode has always been my refuge. As a child I could do nothing else right, but I got A’s. When ex was most damaging, I buried myself in academia. When the illusion shattered, the degree didn’t leave me. I could always shut my heart off & work.

I’m not sure I can anymore.

author: Unspoken❤️
text: A gorgeous start to a new month follows a dreary, poignant eclipse. A day to adjust before soft, warm expansion must face cold, hard routine.

author: Unspoken❤️
text: You’ll never know how deeply I’ve loved you.

author: Unspoken❤️
text: And you… an always present energy, forever gone, your health & happiness my prayer…

author: Unspoken❤️
text:
Flow of change
Unknown and palpable
Silent seismic shift
Most secret heart
Reading all
Without understanding
Unable
To find anything
Within
But the softest
Hidden
Parts of me
Unable
To see without
Consumed
By invisible
Motion

author: Unspoken❤️
text: Seems I’m the girl the gossip is about, again. I wonder if they’d be disappointed to find out I’m actually totally alone?

author: Unspoken❤️
text:
It was the eye of the storm
This is exhausting
And very expensive
Patience, prayer & meditation

author: Unspoken❤️
text:
For you, anything & everything. All of me, all of this & legacy.

Complete acceptance, bc yes, I do know. No need to hide it or change, unless the change is what you really want.

The me that no one has seen.

What do I want? Closeness. Connection. Intimacy, in all of its forms.

author: Unspoken❤️
text:
Today I will handle the fear differently. 

Your assumptions about me remain incorrect. They reveal more about you than me. And as I was only a decoy, targeting me changes nothing.

author: Unspoken❤️
text: I wish I could tell you

author: Unspoken❤️
text: Set me up as the decoy & did the real deception while I was getting targeted. Unreal.

author: Unspoken❤️
text:
A million words of love
Poetry unread
And secrets kept thereof
Safe inside my head

author: Unspoken❤️
text:
No matter how many I meet, I can’t comprehend it.

An extreme positive vibe coupled w/ insidious deception, their pleasure/vibe derived from the power to alter others’ emotions & addict them to the highs via the lows.

The energy that must cost, let alone the intent… Astounding.

author: Unspoken❤️
text: The right cue and the floodgates will open, releasing passionate tides you have no idea even exist.

author: Unspoken❤️
text:
A simple truth, and the bane of modern culture… 

Overuse of the pleasure centers our brains creates tolerance & dependence. Whatever the vehicle.

author: Unspoken❤️
text:
Softened calloused fire
Re-establishes the flow
Secrets of desire
The impeded never show

author: Unspoken❤️
text:
A millimeter at a time
A crack in paper-thin walls
Light
Warms
The skin formed
By mixture of ooze and dust remnant
Calm
Soothing without explanation
And somehow detached
From the rumble
Of the rubble
Suspended in time
Sensation overwhelms all

author: Unspoken❤️
text: I don’t believe anyone ever has, but if they ever do, they really should tell me. I’m not the type to figure that out on my own. https://t.co/bpmysMlCXi

author: Unspoken❤️
text:
And when it all has come to pass
You’re sitting in the aftermath
Questioning the silence

Alone less lonely than deceived
Though not a thing you once believed
Subtlety of violence

Awaiting clarity or peace
Forced operational release
Ends the noncompliance

Lesson is the guidance

author: Unspoken❤️
text:
To know in your soul
And be unable
To explain through the mind
And the heart
Must remain
Silent

author: Unspoken❤️
text:
I do not know what this is
I can find no name or label
And yet
It consumes me
Quietly

author: Unspoken❤️
text:
There is a woman, a lover, inside of me that no man has known (ex-hub hated emotion, I hid her away).

She is passionate & tender, fire in a watery flow that synchs to his depths. Steadfast.

I don’t know if she’ll see expression in this life, less love; but, she is still alive.

author: Unspoken❤️
text:
I am not wild in the modern sense
I’ll skip the party for the shore
But my freedom is my recompense
And I will be controlled no more https://t.co/8cufTiUXGa

author: Unspoken❤️
text:
The rubble silent
A dust cloud sinks
Covering the ooze
A semi-formed puddle
Disguised as rock

Structural remnants
A few foundations 
Of educational rebar
Unrecognized 
Save for attracting resentment
A base 
None the less

In stillness
A moment
Is it peace
Or the eye of the storm

author: Unspoken❤️
text:
And then there’s you
With whom I could fly
Were the cage not
Of your own choosing

author: Unspoken❤️
text: The irony is, by punishing me for the results of work I did throughout my past, they’re leaving that same work as the only thing for me to do with my future.

author: Unspoken❤️
text: The number of people who are utterly certain they know how I ought to be handling every little detail of my life, & yet are also openly angry that my life has been successful in some random given manner, is kind of striking.

author: Unspoken❤️
text: And I’ll love with every breath; silently but essentially…

author: Unspoken❤️
text: I wish you guys were a little more open to being told how loved you are without getting all confused about it. Not everything is about sex, damn it.

author: Unspoken❤️
text:
Released in private
The flame consumes me
Once barely an ember
Soggy with tears
Reignited by love
Unrequited
Drowned over and over
A watery soul
Smoldered
Unable to douse
Yet as the walls crumble
Earth to earth
A palpable roar
Vacillation
Exhausted submission
Arising alone
Ablaze

author: Unspoken❤️
text:
Relief
Survival
Past the point
Of greatest risk
Grateful
My body finally 
Exhales

author: Unspoken❤️
text: Control my nerves for the morning…

author: Unspoken❤️
text: So many things I may not say, or even write. So many things I can’t not feel. And how little any of it matters.

author: Unspoken❤️
text: All I can do is float

author: Unspoken❤️
text: Going out to my “sister” (bestie) here helping to keep my kids afloat while I’m sinking https://t.co/URGlXWz2ac

author: Unspoken❤️
text:
And there is still more

MF
Tower
Periods

I wonder if anything will still be standing when all of this is done?

author: Unspoken❤️
text:
Flailing about
In my cocoon
Trying to find
A piece or two

Without longing for
The unreachable
Untouchable
Inexpressible 

At least distraction
As I dissolve
Into ooze
Of my own making

author: Unspoken❤️
text:
Missing you
An exercise
In everyday
Futility

author: Unspoken❤️
text:
Ooze form & cloistered
Feel more than I should
Called out by
But what did they see

Now rearranges
Adjustment in time
Unknowing
Shifts reality

Ghosts to come calling
Or lessons unlearned
Turned inward
I cannot turn out

To solidify
This movement around
It dances
What is it about

author: Unspoken❤️
text:
Silence
So desperately needed
Peace

Away from
Judgement
Condemnation
Constant
Expectation

Withdrawn into
An energy
Called by others 
As veilless

Bruised
Heal by rearrangement
In echoes of
Silence
A need
Internal peace
